title: Settings
publicAccountDescVisible: Your profile is visible on the Explore page. New events default to public.
publicAccountDescHidden: Your profile is hidden from Explore. New events default to only me.
checkInboxVerify: Check your inbox and click the link to verify your new email.
passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
addEmailForNotifications: Add an email in the Account section to receive notifications.
whenEventUpdated: When an event's time or details change
noNotificationsWarning: Without email notifications you might miss event changes. We recommend adding the
apiKeysHelp: Use API keys to authenticate with the EveryCal API from scripts and scrapers. Send as
newKeyCreated: New API key created — copy it now, you won't see it again:
deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account is permanent. All your events, follows, and data will be erased.
deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and will delete all your events and data.
typeUsernameToConfirm: Please type your username ({{username}}) to confirm:
